00052 #ifndef HEADER_AES_LOCL_H
00053 #define HEADER_AES_LOCL_H
00054 
00055 #include <openssl/e_os2.h>
00056 
00057 #ifdef OPENSSL_NO_AES
00058 #error AES is disabled.
00059 #endif
00060 
00061 #include <stdio.h>
00062 #include <stdlib.h>
00063 #include <string.h>
00064 
00065 #if defined(_MSC_VER) && !defined(OPENSSL_SYS_WINCE)
00066 # define SWAP(x) (_lrotl(x, 8) & 0x00ff00ff | _lrotr(x, 8) & 0xff00ff00)
00067 # define GETU32(p) SWAP(*((u32 *)(p)))
00068 # define PUTU32(ct, st) { *((u32 *)(ct)) = SWAP((st)); }
00069 #else
00070 # define GETU32(pt) (((u32)(pt)[0] << 24) ^ ((u32)(pt)[1] << 16) ^ ((u32)(pt)[2] <<  8) ^ ((u32)(pt)[3]))
00071 # define PUTU32(ct, st) { (ct)[0] = (u8)((st) >> 24); (ct)[1] = (u8)((st) >> 16); (ct)[2] = (u8)((st) >>  8); (ct)[3] = (u8)(st); }
00072 #endif
00073 
00074 typedef unsigned long u32;
00075 typedef unsigned short u16;
00076 typedef unsigned char u8;
00077 
00078 #define MAXKC   (256/32)
00079 #define MAXKB   (256/8)
00080 #define MAXNR   14
00081 
00082 /* This controls loop-unrolling in aes_core.c */
00083 #undef FULL_UNROLL
00084 
00085 #endif /* !HEADER_AES_LOCL_H */
